title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-6.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-6.1 - Scope

State Regulations

This Subpart describes the enforcement authority and
sanctions of the Public Service Commission for achieving and maintaining
compliance with this Part. It also describes the procedures governing the
exercise of that authority and the imposition of those
sanctions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-6.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
